entries: The Guild Wars franchise is the flagship franchise of the Washington state based development studio ArenaNet.
If first entry into it's now 20 year old story is Guild Wars Prophecies, as it was later known.
This book aims to capture the story and the feelings of this beloved game, and bring them to the gaming table with the help of the Dungeons & Dragons 5th edition rule set.
All credit goes to the amazing people at ArenaNet and NCSoft, who have given us players such magical adventures.

entries.name: General Information
entries: The following elemts are the same for all adventures across all Guild Wars campaigns:

items.name: Player Count
entry: The adventures are designed for any number of players, encounters and treasure tables are structured in a way that they scale with the number of players. 'N' is the number of players in the party. Encounter and treasure tables are cummulative, meaning if the party has 'N' players, all the entries up to 'N' players are used.

At the beginning of each adventure is an overview of the recommended skill proficiencies and spells the party should have access to. If the party does not have access to the recommended proficiencies and spells, consider adjusting the adventure to fit the party's capabilities.

entries.name: The Underworld
entries: The Underworld is the places human souls arrive at after dying on Tyria. There {@deity Grenth|GW} is supposed to Judge them and send them to the afterlife they deserve. This usually means the souls move on to one of the other god realms.

In the past 30 odd years this has no longer been the case. {@deity Dhuum|GW}, defeated long ago by Grenth has broken free of his imprisonment in the Hall of Judgement. Now his reign of terror continues where it has left off more than a thousand years ago.

While Dhuum rules the underworld, resurrections are impossible if the soul has entered the Underworld, which happens one minute after death. To bring back potential allies or defeated party members which where not resurrect quickly after death, players need to venture into the Underworld. There they can, if they are below level 12, release single souls by freeing them from the {@creature Keeper of Souls|GW}, a terrifying Shadow Dragon in the service of Dhuum. Alternatively, they can, if they are strong enough, attempt to free the Underworld from Dhuum's influence by first freeing the {@creature Reaper of Grenth|GW|Seven Reapers} and then confronting the God of Death himself. If the players are successfull, all resurrections will be possible again.

{@italic When playing the campaigns Prophecies, Factions, Nightfall and Eye of the North in order, defeating Dhuum will have consequences on the following campaigns. It is not intended to defeat Dhuum once in each campaign. If Dhuum never gets defeated and you plan on playing the Guild Wars 2 campaign and its sequels consider if in the 250 year between the games another adventuring party might have defeated him, otherwise you can run the Hall of Chains adventure in Guild Wars 2.}

entries.name: Travel to the Underworld
entries: Traveling from Tyria to the Underworld is no trivial affair. For low level character consider giving them access via a one time use Item or a friendly NPC. The locations most appropriate to travel from are the Temple of the Ages in Kryta, the Temple to Grenth in the Shiverpeaks, The Catacombs in Ascalon, Zin Ku Corridor in Kaineng City or the Chantry of Secrets in Kourna. For higher level characters the Material component for the {@spell Plane Shift} spell is not a common item, finding one can be an adventure itself. The Material component for the return trip is considerably easier to find. Most major cities have NPCs which could sell them, like High Priests or powerful arcane mages like {@creature Magi Malaquire|GWP} or {@creature Vizier Khilbron|GWP}.

item.name: Lesser Vision Crystal
entries: This poor imitation of the real thing still hums with immense power, almost in defiance to it's original.
Lesser Vision Crystals are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Spiritwood Plank
entries: Infused with the spirits of the fallen this wood is desired by the greatest artisans of the world for it's incredibly strength and flexibility.
Spiritwood Planks are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Deldrimor Steel Ingot
entries: The creation process of Deldrimor Steel is one of the closest guarded secrets by the Deldrimor Dwarves. Very vew non-dwarves know how to create this ally, which is so much more than the sum of it's parts.
Deldrimor Steel Ingots are used in the crafting of very powerful magical items.

item.name: Tome of Capture
entries: This special Tome was crafted by Magi Malaquire. On the first page it urges you to 'Capture them all', whatever that means.
As a reaction, when a hostile enemy within 150 feet reaches 0 hit points, or as a magic action, you can cast the {@spell Signet of Capture|GW} spell using this tome.
When doing so, you can capture an unlimited number of spells in one casting of {@spell Signet of Capture|GW}, but instead of learning them, they are recorded in this tome.
Certain powerful trainers can record spells in this book by spending 1 minute in study.

Any creature can learn a spell recorded in this tome, if it is on the creatures spell list, by spending 10 minutes in study with the tome per spell level. When doing so, the creature can replace a currently prepared spell with the spell learned from this tome.
A spell can be learned from this tome an unlimited number of times by any creature holding the tome or a bonded {@item Signet Ring of Signet of Capture|GW}.

item.name: Signet Ring of Signet of Capture
entries: This special Ring was crafted by Magi Malaquire.
As a reaction, when a hostile enemy within 150 feet reaches 0 hit points, or as a magic action, you can cast the {@spell Signet of Capture|GW} spell using this ring.

When doing so, you can capture an unlimited number of spells in one casting of {@spell Signet of Capture|GW}, but instead of learning them, they are recorded in the {@item Tome of Capture|GW} this ring is bonded to.
As a magic action you can bond this ring to a {@item Tome of Capture|GW}.

item.name: Potion of Arcane Recovery
entries: The potion's blue liquid crackles with arcane energy.
You can choose expended spell slots to recover. The spell slots can have a combined level equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If you have the Pact Magic feature you instead regain 1 spell slot.

Nature Rituals are a type of rituals unique to the ranger profession. These skills summon a spirit that provides a global effect to all those in its area of effect. Unlike Binding Rituals, Nature Rituals affect everyone in their range, enemies and allies alike.
The Nature Ritual spirits resemble miniature druids from the Maguuma Jungle and Melandru's Watcher, the avatar of Melandru, the patron goddess of rangers.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone horror makes a number of Swipe attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Swipe
entries: Natural Weapon: your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d12 + 3} + Spell Level) bludgeoning damage.
Bone Horrors are minions created by certain Necromancer skills (Animate Bone Horror, Malign Intervention, and Aura of the Lich) and the Minion Apocalypse Flux.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bone fiend makes a number of Spike attacks equal to half the level of the spell (rounded down) (minimum 1).

action.name: Spike
entries: {@atk} your spell attack modifier to hit, range 80/120 ft., one target. {@h} ({@damage 1d8 + 3} + Spell Level) piercing damage.
Bone Horrors are minions created by certain Necromancer skills (Animate Bone Horror, Malign Intervention, and Aura of the Lich) and the Minion Apocalypse Flux.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Eve casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Eve makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

action.name: Arcane Burst
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d10 + 3}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Summon Undead (1/Day)
entries: Eve magically summons five {@creature skeleton||skeletons} or {@creature zombie||zombies}. The summoned creatures appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of Eve, whom they obey. They take their turns immediately after Eve. Each lasts for 1 hour, until it or Eve dies, or until Eve dismisses it as a bonus action.

reaction.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
entries: When Eve kills a creature with necrotic damage, she regains 9 ({@damage 2d8}) hit points.
Born in: Unknown
Nation: Ascalon
Profession: Necromancer
Age: 20

Eve hasn't a clue where she was born—she was found as a young child stealing food from a sleeping vagrant in the back alleys of Ascalon City. Fortunately for Eve, she was not found by a city guard but by a kindly matron, who brought her to the Holy Dwayna Academy for Wayward & Incorrigible Girls (Ascalon City branch). Wherever Eve had come from, she had already learned to read at an advanced level before she ended up at the school students called the "Wayward Academy," and voraciously devoured every text in the library. It wasn't long before Eve's curiosity (and her ability to both manipulate and avoid Matron Irma) led her to a secret library in the bowels of the Academy. There, forbidden texts opened up an entirely new world to young Eve. By the time she was 15, she had raised her first bone minion.

Eve had never gotten along with the other girls—she much preferred the company of her tomes and scrolls. When, one day, a few of her fellow students pulled an especially vicious and humiliating prank on her, Eve literally pounced upon the leader of her tormentors, bit the girl’s ear off, and swallowed it whole. That was the end of Eve’s studies at the Holy Dwayna Academy for Wayward & Incorrigible Girls, and not even Matron Irma mourned her departure.

Eve met Mhenlo, Cynn, Devona, and Aidan during the Charr invasion. She was in the graveyard, experimenting with new methods of undead resurrection, when the Charr flooded into the cemetery on the heels of Mhenlo and the others. More out of curiosity than any noble intentions, Eve ordered the Charr to stop. When the beastly creatures turned on her instead, thinking her easy prey, she simply raised her hands and called forth a small army of the dead to meet them. The Charr never stood a chance. Eve was amused when Devona asked the Necromancer to join them, but has since become a good friend of Devona, Aidan, and Mhenlo. She is often in conflict with Cynn, but the two respect each other’s power enough to get along when the going gets rough.

feat.name: Arcane Assassin
entries: You have gained the uncanny ability to extract arcane energy from your victims.
Once per combat, you regain your highest expended level spell slot when you land a Critical Hit.

feat.name: Vengeance of the Protector
entries: Nothing infuriates you more than a friend in need.
While a party member of yours is at 0 hit points, you have a 1d4 bonus on all melee attack rolls against hostile creatures within 150-feet of that party member.

feat.name: Omen of Prophecy
entries: This feat replaces your Cosmic Omen feature.
You have gained a more profound insight into the movement of the cosmos and can therefore influence the future more reliably.

Whenever you finish a Long Rest, you can consult your Star Map for omens and make an Insight check. Until you finish your next Long Rest, you gain access to a special Reaction based on whether you rolled an even or an odd number on the die. If you rolled a natural 20 or a 30+ on your Insight check, you gain access to both (Weal and Woe) and the omen becomes stronger (see the values in parentheses):
Weal (even). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 (60) feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 (1d12) and add the number rolled to the total.
Woe (odd). Whenever a creature you can see within 30 (60) feet of you is about to make a D20 Test, you can take a Reaction to roll 1d6 (1d12) and subtract the number rolled from the total.
You can use this Reaction a number of times equal to (twice) your Wisdom modifier (minimum of once), and you regain all expended uses when you finish a Long Rest.

spell.name: Gash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You wound your enemy grievously.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and, if the target is {@condition bleeding|GW}, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Gash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits a Bleeding foe, you strike for 5...17...20 more damage and that foe suffers a Deep Wound, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Wild Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You imbue your weapon with as much magical power as possible, striking with all your might.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's critical effects and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, any {@variantrule stance|GW} on the target ends.
You lose all adrenaline.
Wild Blow
Melee Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If it hits, this attack will result in a critical hit and any stance being used by your target ends. This attack cannot be blocked.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Flare
entries: Send out a searing hot flare.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage.

{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} On a hit, each creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target, must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Flare
Spell. Send out a flare that strikes target foe for 20...56...65 fire damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, Flare hits adjacent foes as well.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Frenzy
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Enter a frenzy, disregarding any defense.
For the duration, you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn, but you take 50% more damage.
Frenzy
Stance. For 8 seconds, you attack 33% faster but take double damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bane Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Punish a creature for their violence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.
If the creature is attacking and it failed its save, it's knocked {@condition prone}.
Bane Signet
Signet. Target foe takes 26...50...56 holy damage. If target foe was attacking, that foe is knocked down.

spell.name: Banish
entries: You reach out your hand and fire a blinding bolt of divine energy.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack roll against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
If the target is a summoned creature or an undead, you have advantage on the attack roll, and on a hit, it takes an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Banish
Spell. Target foe takes 20...49...56 holy damage. This spell does double damage to summoned creatures.

spell.name: Death Nova
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Enchant a friendly creature to explode on death, damaging and {@condition corruption|GW|corrupting} everything around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, if the creature drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on the creature, and then target each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the creature. Each new target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a new target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and is {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 1d8} damage. On a successful save, a new target takes half as much damage and is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Death Nova
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, if target ally dies, all adjacent foes take 26...85...100 damage and are Poisoned for 15 seconds.

spell.name: Deathly Swarm
entries: You send out a swarm of undead locusts.
Choose one creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage.

If you hit the target, the attack leaps from the target to a different creature of your choice within 30 feet of the target. Make a new attack roll against the new target, and make a new damage roll, which could cause the attack to leap again.
A creature can be targeted only once by each casting of this spell.

components.m: a jar filled with dirt and plants

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Deathly Swarm
Spell. Deathly Swarm flies out slowly and strikes for 30...78...90 cold damage on up to three targets in the area.

spell.name: Empathy
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Increase the empathy of an enemy to an unnatural degree.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. When the target makes an attack roll, it must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage, and for the damage roll, you can roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Empathy
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, whenever target foe attacks, that foe takes 10...46...55 damage and deals 1...12...15 less damage.

spell.name: Fire Storm (Guild Wars)
entries: Conjure a storm of fiery bolts, which rain down from the sky.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 120-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 30 feet.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Fire Storm
Spell. Create a Fire Storm at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that location are struck for 5...29...35 fire damage each second.

spell.name: Backfire
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create an arcane feedback loop in the mind of one creature, causing their spells to become volatile.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration when the target casts a spell of 1st level or higher, the target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage per spell slot level.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the final damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Backfire
Hex Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target foe casts a spell, that foe takes 35...119...140 damage.

spell.name: Meteor
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Summon a meteor to crash down.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d12} bludgeoning damage and {@damage 4d6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage and the fire damage increase by {@dice 1d12} and {@dice 1d6} respectively for each slot level above 3rd.
Meteor
Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 7...91...112 fire damage and knocked down.

spell.name: Retribution
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Wreath yourself or an ally in retaliatory holy light, which punishes all those who harm you.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, target the creature that dealt the damage. The new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the new target takes 50% of the damage they dealt as radiant damage (minimum 1, maximum 10). On a successful save, the new target takes half as much damage.
Retribution
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target ally takes attack damage, this spell deals 33% of the damage back to the source (maximum 5...17...20 damage).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage maximum increases by 10 for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Read the Wind
entries: {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
You focus your bond with nature to get insight into the air currents and the wind.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d4} damage and when you make an attack roll with a ranged weapon, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the attack roll.

components.m: a stick and a piece of string

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage and attack roll bonus each increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Read the Wind
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows move twice as fast and deal 3...9...10 extra damage.

spell.name: Shielding Hands
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Envelop a friendly creature in spectral shielding hands, guarding them from damage.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 1d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
When this spell ends, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability.

components.m: half a dozen bushels of wool

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Shielding Hands
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, damage and life steal received by target ally is reduced by 3...15...18. When Shielding Hands ends, that ally is healed for 5...41...50 Health.

spell.name: Orison of Healing
entries: You invigorate one friendly creature with the soothing rays of dawn.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Orison of Healing
Spell. Heal target ally for 20...60...70 Health.

spell.name: Reversal of Fortune

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range take damage

entries: Twist the fate around one creature, healing them instead of harming them.
Roll {@dice 1d6} and subtract the number rolled from the damage, and the creature regains hit points equal to the number rolled.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Reversal of Fortune
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, the next time target ally would take damage or life steal, that ally gains that amount of Health instead, maximum 15...67...80.

spell.name: Healing Breeze
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
You invoke a divine healing breeze around one friendly creature you can see, healing them over time.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Healing Breeze
Enchantment Spell. For 15 seconds, target ally gains +4...8...9 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Infuse Health
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 50% (Current)
You sacrifice some of your health to mend another creature's injuries.
Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to 100% of the health sacrificed.

m.text: a drop of your own blood, a needle and a water skin

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by 10% for each slot level above 1st.
Infuse Health
Spell. Lose half your current Health. Target other ally is healed for 100...129...136% of the amount you lost.

spell.name: Faintheartedness
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Curse a creature with faintheartedness making them slower and deteriorating them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, regardless of the target's abilities or magic items, the target can't make more than one melee or ranged attack during its turn, and at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} per slot level above 1st.
Faintheartedness
Hex Spell. For the next 3...13...16 seconds, target foe attacks 50% slower, and that foe suffers -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

spell.name: Life Siphon
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create a tether of life essence between you and another creature, siphoning away their vitality.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Life Siphon
Hex Spell. For 12...22...24 seconds, target foe suffers -1...3...3 Health degeneration, and you gain +1...3...3 Health regeneration.

spell.name: Vampiric Gaze
entries: Stare into the soul of a creature, stealing some of their life essence.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.
Vampiric Gaze
Spell. Steal up to 18...52...60 Health from target foe.

spell.name: Ether Feast
entries: Siphon the energy of a creature to heal yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, you regain hit points equal to four times the initiative lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Ether Feast
Spell. Target foe loses 3 Energy. You are healed 20...56...65 for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Glyph of Lesser Energy
entries: Invoke the Glyph of Lesser Energy by drawing it into the air as a glowing symbol.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level, the spell does not expend a spell slot. After this spell triggers {@dice 1d4 + 1} times, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the amount of time this spell can trigger increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.
Glyph of Lesser Energy
Glyph. For the next 15 seconds, your next 2 spells cost 10...16...18 less Energy to cast.

spell.name: Cyclone Axe

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Imbue your weapon with magical force to strike everyone around you.
Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Cyclone Axe
Axe Attack. Perform a spinning axe attack striking for +4...10...12 damage to all adjacent opponents.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Executioner's Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 8, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You strike with extreme ferocity, attempting a killing blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 6d6} damage.
Executioner's Strike
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...34...40 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 2d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Hammer Bash

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You put your entire weight into an extremely heavy blow.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d12} damage, and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Hammer Bash
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Hammer Bash hits, your target is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Sever Artery

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You attempt to make your enemy bleed out.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Sever Artery
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, the opponent begins Bleeding for 5...21...25 seconds, losing Health over time.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Power Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You infuse your next projectile with deadly force.
On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8 + 10} force damage.
Power Shot
Bow Attack. If Power Shot hits, target foe takes 25...45...50 damage. .

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8 + 5} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Aura of Restoration
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
You envelop yourself in a restorative aura, which cycles your spell energy to heal yourself.
For the duration, when you cast a spell of 1st level or higher, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per spell slot level.
Aura of Restoration
Enchantment Spell. For 60 seconds, you gain 0...1...1 Energy and are healed for 200...440...500% of the Energy cost each time you cast a spell.

components.m: a pouch of mixed seeds and a pinte of water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the final healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blinding Flash
entries: Conjure an extremely bright flash of light right in front of a creature's eyes.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition blinded} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Blinding Flash
Spell. Target foe is Blinded for 3...7...8 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Conjure Phantasm
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Conjure an illusory phantasm in a creature's mind, tormenting it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 3d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Conjure Phantasm
Hex Spell. For 2...13...16 seconds, target foe experiences -5 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Imagined Burden
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create the illusion of heavy weight.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the target's speed is halved. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Imagined Burden
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe moves 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Healing Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Focus on healing yourself, leaving you exposed.
You regain hit points equal to {@dice 4d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
For the duration, you have vulnerability to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Healing Signet
Signet. You gain 82...154...172 Health. You have -40 armor while using this skill.

spell.name: Comfort Animal
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
You comfort a friendly animal with a soothing word and a reassuring gesture.
Choose one companion that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spell casting ability modifier.

Alternatively, you touch a companion that has died within the last minute. The companion returns to life with 1 hit point. This spell can't return to life a companion that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
This spell can be used instead of the {@spell Charm Animal|GW} spell, to maintain the {@condition charmed} condition on a companion {@condition charmed} by it.
Comfort Animal

Skill. You heal your animal companion for 20...87...104 Health. If your companion is dead, it is resurrected with 10...48...58% Health. If you have Comfort Animal equipped, your animal companion will travel with you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Dual Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You duplicate your next projectile.
Make two ranged weapon attacks against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects.
Dual Shot
Bow Attack. Shoot two arrows simultaneously at target foe. These arrows deal 25% less damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Troll Unguent
entries: You apply some healing troll unguent to yourself.
For the duration at the start of each of your turns, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} hit points.
If you drop to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Troll Unguent
Skill. For 13 seconds, you gain +3...9...10 Health regeneration.

components.m: a mixture of herbs, swamp water and love

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Disrupting Chop

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 6
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Disrupting Chop
Axe Attack. If it hits, this attack interrupts the target's current action. If that action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Kindle Arrows
entries: {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Ignite your arrows.
For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal fire damage and deal an additional {@damage 1d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Kindle Arrows
Preparation. For 24 seconds, your arrows deal fire damage and hit for an additional 3...20...24 fire damage.

spell.name: Judge's Insight
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue a creature with holy energy, and give them insight into their enemies defenses.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target's weapon attacks deal radiant damage and gain the Armor Penetration property.
Judge's Insight
Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target ally's attacks deal holy damage and have +20% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Enfeebling Blood
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Corrupt some of your own blood to weaken an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enfeebling Blood
Spell. Target foe and all nearby foes suffer from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Epidemic
entries: Make your enemies conditions contagious.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than the chosen target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature gains a copy of each harmful condition on the chosen target. On a successful save, a target gains a copy with its duration reduced to 1 round.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Epidemic
Spell. Spread all negative conditions and their remaining durations from target foe to all foes adjacent to your target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Enervating Charge
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}
Fire a jolt of electricity, weakening on hit.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d12} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Enervating Charge
Spell. Target foe is struck for 25...45...50 lightning damage and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds. This spell has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Immolate
entries: Ignite a creature with searing flames.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage and starts {@condition burning|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d6} damage. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and {@condition burning|GW|burns} for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Immolate
Spell. Target foe is struck for 20...64...75 fire damage and is set on fire for 1...3...3 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Hunter's Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire a well-aimed shot to make a creature bleed.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the ranged attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d8} damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d8}).
Hunter's Shot
Bow Attack. If this attack hits, your target bleeds for 3...21...25 seconds.

spell.name: Dark Pact
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Call upon a dark force, sacrificing blood to inflict harm.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage.
This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when you reach 5th level ({@dice 3d8}), 11th level ({@dice 4d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 5d8}).
Dark Pact
Spell. Deal 10...40...48 shadow damage to target foe.

components.m: a drop of your own blood and a half dozen candles

spell.name: Armor of Earth
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Encase yourself in a shielding armor of earth, improving your defense at the cost of your agility.
For the duration, your speed is reduced by 50%, and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
Armor of Earth
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, you gain 24...53...60 armor, but move 50...21...14% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the % decreases by 5% for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: "For Great Justice!"
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline}, {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Imbue yourself with a sense of justice, generating adrenaline at an increased rate.
For the duration, your adrenaline gain is doubled.
"For Great Justice!"
Shout. For 20 seconds, whenever you gain adrenaline, you gain 100% more.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Heal Party
entries: Heal your party.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. A target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Heal Party
Spell. Heal entire party for 30...66...75 Health.

spell.name: Mark of Pain
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
You magically inscribe a mark of pain on a creature, which causes all creatures around to take damage when it takes physical damage.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when the target takes bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A new target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Mark of Pain
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target foe takes physical damage, Mark of Pain deals 10...34...40 shadow damage to adjacent foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Earth Attunement
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Empower your earth magic, by attuning to the earth.
For the Duration, when you would expend a spell slot to cast an earth themed spell, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.

components.m: a small shovel and a bucket

entries: Earth Attunement
Enchantment Spell. For 36...55...60 seconds, you are attuned to Earth. You gain 1 Energy plus 30% of the base Energy cost of the skill each time you use Earth Magic.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd or 4th level, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can maintain your {@status concentration} on the spell for up to 24 hours.

spell.name: Dismember

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You attempt to sever off a body part.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d6} damage, and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Dismember
Axe Attack. If it hits, this axe blow will inflict a Deep Wound on the target foe, lowering that foe's maximum Health by 20% for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Distracting Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If an ability or spell failed this way, the ability/spell can't be used again for the duration.
Distracting Shot
Bow Attack. If Distracting Shot hits, it interrupts target foe's action but deals only 1...13...16 damage. If the interrupted action was a skill, that skill is disabled for an additional 20 seconds.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Parasitic Bond
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW|Hex:} You cannot choose to end {@status concentration} on this spell.
Magically implant a parasite into a creature, harming them until they die and gaining health on their death.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only, and you do not heal at the end.
When this spell ends, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.

This spell's healing and damage increase by {@dice 1d4} and {@dice 1d8}, respectively, when you reach 5th level ({@dice 2d4}/{@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d4}/{@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d4}/{@dice 4d8}).
Parasitic Bond
Hex Spell. For 20 seconds, target foe suffers -1 Health degeneration. The caster is healed for 30...102...120 when Parasitic Bond ends.

spell.name: Diversion
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Create a diversion to distract a creature, causing their next ability or spell to be temporarily forgotten.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, the next spell or ability the target uses can't be used again for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 3 rounds only.
Diversion
Hex Spell. For 6 seconds, the next time target foe uses a skill, that skill takes an additional 10...47...56 seconds to recharge.

m.text: a shiny silver coin worth 1+ SP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Endure Pain
entries: Greatly increase your pain tolerance for a short duration.
For the duration, your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by {@dice 3d10} + Constitution modifier.
Endure Pain
Skill. For 7...16...18 seconds you have an additional 90...258...300 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, your hit points increase by an additional {@dice 2d10} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Reflexes
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
You magically enhance your reflexes and attack speed.
For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC and you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Lightning Reflexes
Stance. For 5...10...11 seconds, you have a 75% chance to block melee and projectile attacks, and you attack 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Putrid Explosion
entries: Explode a corpse.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target to target each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} necrotic. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Putrid Explosion
Spell. The corpse nearest your target explodes, sending out a shockwave that deals 24...101...120 damage to nearby foes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Burn
entries: Make the energy in a creature burn it up from the inside.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage per initiative lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Burn
Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy and takes 9 damage for each point of Energy lost.

spell.name: Hamstring

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You attempt to cripple a creature, slowing their movement.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.

At 5th level, the melee attack also deals an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to the target on a hit. This damage increases by {@dice 1d6} when you reach 11th level ({@dice 2d6}) and 17th level ({@dice 3d6}).
Hamstring

entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Imbue yourself with divine energy to heal every time you support a creature.

For the duration, when you target a friendly creature with a spell of 1st level or higher, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}.
Divine Boon

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever you cast a Protection Prayer [sic] or Divine Favor spell that targets an ally, that ally is healed for 15...51...60 Health, and you lose 1 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Defile Flesh
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 10%
Utter a corrupting curse, defiling a creature's flesh, making it so they heal for less.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target regains hit points, they regain 33% fewer hit points.
Defile Flesh
Hex Spell. For 5...29...35 seconds, target foe gains only two-thirds Health from healing.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Irresistible Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Deliver a mighty blow that is sure to hit.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d12} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d12} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Irresistible Blow
Hammer Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Irresistible Blow is blocked, your target is knocked down and takes 5...17...20 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Debilitating Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire a debilitating shot, lowering initiative on hit.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d6}.
Debilitating Shot
Bow Attack. If Debilitating Shot hits, your target loses 1...8...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction in initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Seeking Blade

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Strike with magical precision, {@condition bleeding|GW}, and damage even on a miss.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d6} damage.
On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Seeking Blade
Sword Attack. If this attack hits you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Seeking Blade is blocked, your target begins Bleeding for 25 seconds and takes 1...16...20 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit or miss.

spell.name: Well of Blood
entries: Utter a foul curse, exploding a corpse into a well of blood, healing allies in its area every turn.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target; for the duration, you create a 20-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each friendly creature in that Cylinder gains temporary hit points equal to {@dice 2d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier. A creature also gains these temporary hit points if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature can only gain these temporary hit points once per turn.

On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to exploit another corpse within range, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, to teleport the Cylinder to the location of the new corpse.
Well of Blood
Well Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to create a Well of Blood at its location. For 8...18...20 seconds, allies in that area receive +1...5...6 Health regeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the temporary hit points increase by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ward Against Foes
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, slowing down foes.
Conjure a 20-foot-radius stationary ward at your location for the duration, and choose any number of creatures. If a non-chosen creature is in the radius of the spell, its speed is halved.
Ward Against Foes
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Foes at your current location. For 8...18...20 seconds, non-spirit foes in this area move 50% slower.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Pin Down

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Attempt to cripple a creature by pinning down their foot to the floor.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Pin Down
Bow Attack. If Pin Down hits, your target is Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Fragility
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Make an area of creatures fragile, taking damage every time a condition is applied or ends on them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when a target gains or loses a harmful condition, a target takes {@damage 2d6} psychic damage. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
Fragility
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target and adjacent foes take 5...17...20 damage each time they suffer or recover from a new condition.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Distracting Blow

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Quickly swipe at your foes, potentially disrupting their spell or ability.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee weapon attack against each target. On a hit, a target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, if a target is casting a spell or using an ability, the ability/spell fails and has no effect. Otherwise, on a failed save, a target can't cast spells or use abilities until the end of their next turn.
Distracting Blow
Melee Attack. Swipe your weapon at the target, dealing no damage but disrupting the target's current action (and the actions of foes adjacent to your target).

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, a target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 4th on a hit.

spell.name: Rotting Flesh
entries: Make a creature start to rot to {@condition disease|GW} them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition disease|GW|diseased} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Rotting Flesh
Spell. Target fleshy foe becomes Diseased for 10...22...25 seconds, slowly losing Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Power Spike

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within 60 feet of you casting a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell and drive a psychic spike into their brain.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, the target must make an Intelligence saving throw with disadvantage. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 8d6} psychic damage. If you did not successfully interrupt a spell this way, the creature makes the saving throw with advantage.
Power Spike
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or a chant, that skill is interrupted and target foe takes 30...102...120 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Blurred Vision
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Conjure up a fog, which makes your opponents more likely to miss with their attacks.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration when a target makes an attack roll with a weapon, they must roll a {@dice d8} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
Blurred Vision
Hex Spell. For 4...9...10 seconds, target foe and adjacent foes are hexed with Blurred Vision. While hexed, those foes have a 50% chance to miss with attacks.

m.text: a pair of smudged reading glasses worth 10+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the radius of the spell increases by 5 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Gale
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Create a large burst of air, to knock a creature {@condition prone}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. If the target is large or smaller, it's knocked {@condition prone}.
Gale
Spell. Knock down target foe for 2 seconds. (50% failure chance with Air Magic 4 or less.)

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Whirling Defense
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Whirl around, blocking incoming attacks, and deflecting projectiles, damaging all creatures around you.

For the duration, you have a +5 bonus to AC against weapon attacks and if a ranged attack misses you because of this bonus, target each hostile creature other than you within a 10-foot Emanation. A target takes {@damage 1d6} slashing damage.
Whirling Defense
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you have 75% chance to block attacks. Whenever you block a projectile in this way, adjacent foes take 5...10...11 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 3rd and the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Remove Hex
entries: Remove the latest harmful spell on a creature.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends.
Remove Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Strip Enchantment
entries: Strip the latest beneficial spell on a hostile creature to steal life from it.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, the target takes {@dice 3d8} necrotic damage per spell ended, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt.
Strip Enchantment
Spell. Remove 0...2...2 enchantment[s] from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you steal 5...53...65 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, one additional spell ends for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Drain Enchantment
entries: Drain a beneficial spell on a hostile creature to heal yourself and improve your initiative.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The Target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the latest beneficial spell on the target ends. If a beneficial spell was ended this way, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d6}.
Drain Enchantment
Spell. Remove an enchantment from target foe. If an enchantment is removed, you gain 8...15...17 Energy and 40...104...120 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing each increases  by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd and the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ice Spear
entries: Conjure up an ice spear and hurl it at a creature, healing yourself if you are {@condition overcast|GW}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d8} cold damage.
{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} At the start of your next turn, you regain hit points equal to {@dice 1d8}.
Ice Spear
Enchantment Spell. Send out an Ice Spear, striking target foe for 10...50...60 cold damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, you gain +1...3...4 Health regeneration for 5 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage and healing each increase by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Swift Chop

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Deliver a swift chop that is sure to hit.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d6} damage.

On a miss, the target takes {@damage 1d6} damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target gains a {@condition deep wound|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Swift Chop
Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +1...16...20 damage. If Swift Chop is blocked, target foe takes 1...16...20 damage and suffers a Deep Wound for 20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 2nd on a hit.

spell.name: Suffering
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Utter a foul curse, causing suffering in an area.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration at the start of each of a target's turns, a target takes {@damage 1d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
Suffering
Hex Spell. For 6...25...30 seconds, target foe and all nearby foes suffer -0...2...3 Health degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Stoning
entries: Hurl a large stone at a creature, potentially knocking them {@condition prone} if they are weak.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d10} force damage, and if the target is {@condition weakness|GW|weakened}, it is knocked {@condition prone}.
Stoning
Spell. Send out a large stone, striking target foe for 45...93...105 earth damage if it hits. If Stoning hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Together as One!
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Inspire your allies to deal more damage with attacks and regain health every turn.

Choose any number of friendly creatures that can hear you and are within 20-foot of you, or any companion within range. For the duration, a target's weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d6} damage and at the start of each of a target's turns, a target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4}.
If a target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends on that target.
"Together as One!"
Elite Shout. For 3...13...15 seconds, all party members near you or near your pet deal +5...13...15 additional damage with attacks and gain +1...6...7 Health regeneration. PvE Skil

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 3rd, and the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Echo
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Create an echo of the next spell you cast, casting it twice in quick succession.
For the duration, the next time you finish casting a spell of 3rd level or lower, you cast that spell again (no action required), without expending a spell slot or requiring material components.
Echo
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, Echo is replaced with the next skill you use. Echo acts as this skill for 30 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number of casts increases by 1 for every two slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blood is Power
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 33%
Sacrifice some of your own blood to fuel a creature's spells.

Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration, when the creature would expend a spell slot to cast a spell of 7th level or lower, roll a {@dice d20}. On a 15 or higher, the spell does not expend a spell slot.
Blood is Power
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, target other ally gains +3...5...6 Energy regeneration.
