entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number you need to roll decreases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Drain
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Siphon energy from a creature to gain it yourself.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d8}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces the target's initiative, your initiative gets increased by thrice the initiative lost.
Energy Drain
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 2...8...9 Energy. You gain 3 Energy for each point of Energy lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Escape
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Become nimble, attempting to escape.
For the duration, your speed increases by 33%, and you have a +5 bonus to AC.
Escape
Elite Stance. For 1...7...8 second[s], you move 33% faster and have a 75% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Energy Surge
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Make the energy in a group of creatures burn them up from the inside.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 2d6}. On a successful save, the target's initiative gets reduced by half as much.
If this spell reduces a target's initiative, a target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage per initiative lost.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.
Energy Surge
Elite Spell. Target foe loses 1...8...10 Energy. For each point of Energy lost, that foe and all nearby foes take 9 damage.

spell.name: "Charge!"
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Shout|GW}
Inspire your allies to move faster.
Target each friendly creature that can hear you within range. End the {@condition crippled|GW} condition on a target and for the duration, a target's speed is increased by 33%.
"Charge!"
Elite Shout. Allies in earshot lose the Crippled condition. For 5...11...13 seconds, these allies move 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ferocious Strike
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Command your companion to attempt a Ferocious Strike.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d10} damage. You gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline, and your initiative gets increased by {@dice 4d4}.
Ferocious Strike
Elite Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Ferocious Strike that deals +13...25...28 damage. If that attack hits, you gain adrenaline and 3...9...10 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Judgment Strike
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Imbue your fist with holy might, to strike everyone around you.

Target each creature, other than you, that you can see within range. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 4d8} radiant damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Judgment Strike
Elite Melee Attack. Attack target and adjacent foes. Each attack that hits deals +13...27...30 Holy damage [sic] and knocks down attacking foes. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Grenth's Balance
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Invoke the judgment of the god of death and balance out your health with a creature of your choice.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, if the target has more hit points than you do, you regain hit points equal to up to half the difference and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained. On a successful save, you regain hit points equal to up to a quarter the difference, and the target takes necrotic damage equal to the amount of hit points you gained.
Grenth's Balance

Elite Spell. If target foe has more Health than you, you gain half the difference (up to your maximum Health), and that foe loses an equal amount. If this foe has less Health than you, you lose half the difference, and that foe gains an equal amount.

m.text: a small platinum scale worth 3000+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level or higher, the target makes its saving throw with disadvantage.

spell.name: Battle Rage
entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Enter a battle rage, moving faster and generating adrenaline.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 33%, and you gain one strike of adrenaline when you hit with a weapon attack.
Battle Rage
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, you move 33% faster and gain double adrenaline from attacks. Battle Rage ends if you use any non-adrenal skills.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Mind Burn
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to sear a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and {@condition burning|GW} if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d6} fire damage, and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 2d6} fire damage and start {@condition burning|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d6} damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and {@condition burning|GW|burns} for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Mind Burn

Elite Spell. Target foe and all adjacent foes take 15...51...60 fire damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe and all adjacent foes take an additional 15...51...60 fire damage and are set on fire for 1...8...10 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the fire damage each increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and the damage of the {@condition burning|GW} condition increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Mind Freeze
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Hex|GW}, {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 2
Use the power of your mind to freeze a group of enemies, inflicting more damage and slowing them down if you have a higher initiative than them.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make an Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} cold damage, and if a target has a lower initiative than you, they take an additional {@damage 2d8} cold damage, and their speed is reduced by 90% to a minimum of 5 feet for the duration. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect.
Mind Freeze

Elite Hex Spell. Target foe takes 10...50...60 cold damage. If you have more Energy than target foe, that foe suffers an additional 10...50...60 cold damage and moves 90% slower for 1...4...5 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage each increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Cleave

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 4, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Enhance your weapon with powerful magic.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 3d6} damage.
Cleave
Elite Axe Attack. If this attack hits, you strike for +10...26...30 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 2d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Martyr
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Martyr yourself by transferring all conditions on allies to yourself.
Target each friendly creature other than you within range. You gain a copy of each harmful condition on a target. End all copied conditions on a target.
Martyr
Elite Spell. Transfer all conditions and their remaining durations from your allies to you.

spell.name: Devastating Hammer

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 7, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Channel your adrenaline into a Devastating Bash, knocking your target {@condition prone} and inflicting {@condition weakness|GW}.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 1d12} damage, and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and suffers from {@condition weakness|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only and is not knocked {@condition prone}.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Devastating Hammer
Elite Hammer Attack. If Devastating Hammer hits, your target is knocked down and suffers from Weakness for 5...17...20 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Plague Signet
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Plague Signet to transfer most of your conditions to an enemy.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target gains a copy of each harmful condition on yourself. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Signet
Elite Signet. Transfer all negative conditions with 100...180...200% of their remaining durations from yourself to target foe. (50% failure chance with Curses 4 or less.)

spell.name: Shield of Regeneration
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure a magical shield, which heals a creature every turn and reduces all damage they take.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} and when the target takes damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing each increases  by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd and the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.
Shield of Regeneration
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...11...13 seconds, target ally gains +3...9...10 Health regeneration and 40 armor.

spell.name: Soul Taker
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}, {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} {@dice 2d4}
Make your attacks rip the souls out of your foes body, dealing more damage but also hurting you every time you attack.
For the duration, when you make an attack with a weapon, you sacrifice health equal to {@dice 2d4}. Additionally, your weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage.
Soul Taker
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 3...25...30 seconds, your attacks sacrifice 15...19...20 health and deal 15...19...20 more damage. PvE Skill

m.text: a small clouded pearl worth 450+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the additional weapon damage increases by {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mantra of Recovery
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Start chanting a mantra of recovery, allowing you to cast multiple spells per turn.
For the duration, casting spells with a spell slot does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn.
Mantra of Recovery
Elite Stance. For 5...17...20 seconds, spells you cast recharge 33% faster.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Obsidian Flesh
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Partially turn your flesh into obsidian, reducing the damage you take, making you non-targetable by spells but preventing you from attacking and reducing your ability to cast spells.

For the duration, you cannot be targeted by hostile spells and when you take damage, you can roll {@dice 2d4} and subtract the number rolled from the damage. Additionally, regardless of your abilities or magic items, you can't make melee or ranged weapon attacks.
Obsidian Flesh
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, you gain +20 armor and cannot be the target of enemy spells, but cannot attack and have -2 energy degeneration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: Over the Limit
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Push your spellcasting over the limit.

For the duration, casting spells with a spell slot does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn, and you can cast spells which take an action to cast as a bonus action, but any spell you cast causes you to gain 2 rounds of {@condition overcast|GW}.
Over the Limit
Elite Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, your spells cast 15...19...20% faster, and recharge 15...43...50% faster, but you continuously gain Overcast. PvE Skill

spell.name: Spell Breaker
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Put a magical ward on a creature, breaking any spells attempting to target them.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target cannot be targeted by hostile spells.
Spell Breaker
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 5...15...17 seconds, target ally cannot be the target of enemy spells.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 7th.

spell.name: Tainted Flesh
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Taint the flash of a friendly creature, making them immune to diseases and causing {@condition disease|GW} to any creature who attacks them in melee.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. End the {@condition disease|GW|diseased} condition on the target. For the duration, the target is immune to the {@condition disease|GW|diseased} condition, and when the target takes damage from a melee attack or deals damage to a creature with a melee attack, target the creature that dealt the damage or took the damage. The new target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition disease|GW|diseased} for the duration, taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Tainted Flesh
Elite Enchantment Spell. For 20...39...44 seconds, target ally is immune to disease, and anyone striking that ally in melee becomes Diseased for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st, and you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hundred Blades
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Quickly flourish your blade when attacking, damaging everyone around you.

For the duration, if you are wielding a melee weapon which deals slashing damage, when you make a melee weapon attack roll, target each creature other than you within 5-feet. A target takes {@damage 1d6} slashing damage.
Hundred Blades
Elite Skill. For 15 seconds, whenever you attack with a sword, all adjacent foes take 10...22...25 slashing damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp which deals slashing damage

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Seven Weapons Stance
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Gain mastery over your weapons.

For the duration, your proficiency bonus is doubled when making attack or damage rolls with weapons you are proficient with, and you can attack one additional time when you take the attack action on your turn.
Seven Weapons Stance
Elite Stance. For 3...17...20 seconds, your weapon attributes are increased by +1...12...15 and you attack 33% faster. PvE Skill

spell.name: Spike Trap
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Prepare a spike trap, which damages, cripples and knocks creatures {@condition prone} which trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effects for 2 rounds:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d4} piercing damage, becomes {@condition crippled|GW} for 1 minute and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Spike Trap

Elite Trap. When Spike Trap is triggered, every second (for 2 seconds), all nearby foes are struck for 10...34...40 piercing damage, become Crippled for 3...21...25 seconds, and are knocked down. Spike Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 4d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Word of Healing
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Utter a Word of healing, which heals low health creatures for more.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier. If the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, they regain additional hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.
Word of Healing
Elite Spell. Heal target ally for 5...81...100 Health. Heal for an additional 30...98...115 Health if that ally is below 50% Health.

spell.name: Time Ward
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Create a pocket of space where time passes differently for allies inside it.

Conjure a 20-foot-radius stationary ward at your location for the duration, and choose any number of creatures. For the duration, if a target is in the radius of the spell, casting spells with a spell slot does not prevent them from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn, and a target can cast spells that take an action to cast as a bonus action.
Time Ward
Elite Ward Spell. You create a Time Ward at your location. For 3...13...15 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area cast spells 15...19...20% faster and recharge skills 15...19...20% faster. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, the duration increases to 1 hour.

spell.name: Shadow Theft
entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}
Shadow step to a creature, draining their power and empowering your own.

Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. Teleport within 5 feet of the target to an unoccupied space. For the duration, each of the target's ability scores are reduced by {@dice 1d4} each, and each of yours are increased correspondingly by the amount lost. This cannot reduce a creature's ability scores below 1.
This is considered a {@variantrule Lead Attack|GWF}.
Shadow Theft

Elite Skill. Shadow Step to target foe. For 5...17...20 seconds that foe's attributes are reduced by 1...4...5 and your attributes are increased by 1...4...5. This skill counts as a Lead Attack. PvE Skill

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the change in ability scores increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Signet of Judgment

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range make an attack roll

entries: {@variantrule Elite|GW}, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of making an attack roll and smite all creatures around it.

Choose one attacking creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}, and the attack roll misses. Then you target each hostile creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage.
Signet of Judgment
Elite Signet. Target foe is knocked down. That foe and all adjacent foes take 15...63...75 holy damage.

spell.name: Mend Ailment
entries: Magically cure a condition from a creature, healing them for every condition remaining on them.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. End the latest of harmful condition on the target. Then the target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4} per condition affecting it.
Mend Ailment

Spell. Remove one condition (Poison, Disease, Blindness, Dazed, Bleeding, Crippled, Burning, Weakness, Cracked Armor, or Deep Wound) from target ally. For each remaining Condition, that ally is healed for 5...57...70 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Bull's Strike

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Attempt a bull's strike, knocking {@condition prone} moving foes.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage and must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
Bull's Strike
Melee Attack. If this attack hits a moving foe, you strike for +5...25...30 damage, and your target is knocked down.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Plague Touch
entries: Touch a creature with plague infested hands, transferring conditions.

Choose one creature within range. Make a melee spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target gains a copy of the latest {@dice 1d4} harmful conditions on yourself. End all copied conditions on yourself.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Plague Touch
Skill. Transfer 1...3...3 negative condition[s] and [its/their] remaining duration[s] from yourself to target touched foe.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, copy {@dice 1d4} additional conditions for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Final Thrust

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 10, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Deliver a final powerful thrust, losing all adrenaline and finishing off low-health creatures.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 6d6} damage. If the target was below 50% of their maximum hit points, the target takes an additional {@damage 6d6} damage.
You lose all adrenaline.
Final Thrust
Sword Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If Final Thrust hits, you deal 1...32...40 more damage. This damage is doubled if your target was below 50% Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Balanced Stance
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Perfectly balance yourself, gaining immunity to being knocked {@condition prone} and not tacking extra damage from critical hits.
For the duration, you are immune to the {@condition prone} condition, and you do not take extra damage from critical hits.
Balanced Stance
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you cannot be knocked down and you do not suffer extra damage from a critical attack.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Apply Poison
entries: {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Sheath your arrows in {@condition corruption|GW|corrupting} frog venom, making them inflict {@condition corruption|GW} on a hit.

For the duration, when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, they must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition corruption|GW|corrupted} for 1 minute, taking {@damage 2d8} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Apply Poison
Preparation. For 24 seconds, foes struck by your physical attacks become Poisoned for 3...13...15 seconds.

m.text: a vial of venom worth 25+ GP

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage of the corrupted condition increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Arcane Echo
entries: Create an arcane echo of the next spell you cast, casting it twice in quick succession.
For the duration, the next time you finish casting a spell of 2nd level or lower, you cast that spell again (no action required), without expending a spell slot or requiring material components.
Arcane Echo
Enchantment Spell. If you cast a spell in the next 20 seconds, Arcane Echo is replaced with that spell for 20 seconds. Arcane Echo ends prematurely if you use a non-spell skill.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the number of casts increases by 1 for every three slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Blood of the Master
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 5% + 2% per undead minion chosen by you
Sacrifice your own blood for each undead minion you control, healing them.

Choose any number of friendly undead creatures, which have been created by a spell or an ability, that you can see. Each target regains hit points equal to {@dice 2d4} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Blood of the Master
Spell. All of your undead allies are healed for 30...99...116 Health. You sacrifice an additional 2% maximum Health per minion healed in this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the healing each increases  by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Holy Veil
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure up a holy veil around a creature, obscuring them from harmful spells.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration If the target is the target of a harmful spell which requires {@status concentration}, that spell requires twice as long to cast.
When this spell ends, the latest harmful spell on the target ends.
Holy Veil
Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, any hex cast on target ally takes twice as long to cast. When Holy Veil ends, one hex is removed from target ally.

components.m: a veil and a drop of holy water

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Precision Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Unblockable|GW}, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire an extremely precise shot, which deals more damage on a hit and ignores any temporary AC bonuses.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d8} damage.
Precision Shot
Bow Attack. If Precision Shot hits, you strike for +3...9...10 damage. Precision Shot cannot be blocked. This action is easily interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Cry of Frustration

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: Unleash a psychic scream, disrupting a group of creatures.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. Target each hostile creature in a 15-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, if the creature is casting a spell or is using an ability, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted, and the creature takes {@damage 8d6} psychic damage. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
Otherwise, on a failed save, a target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn and takes {@damage 8d6} psychic damage.
Cry of Frustration
Spell. If target foe is using a skill, that foe and all foes in the area are interrupted and suffer 15...63...75 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Dark Aura
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Surround a creature with an ominous aura, which lashes out at creatures around it as they sacrifice health, fueled by your blood.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, when the target loses health as part of their own spell effect, except by taking damage, target each hostile creature in a 10-foot Emanation. Each new target takes {@damage 3d8} necrotic damage, and you lose health equal to {@dice 1d6}, which cannot trigger Dark Aura.
Dark Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 30 seconds, whenever target ally sacrifices Health, Dark Aura deals 5...41...50 shadow damage to adjacent foes, and you lose 5...17...20 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th, and the health loss increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 4th.

spell.name: Maelstrom (Guild Wars)
entries: {@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} 5
Conjure a maelstrom, which crushes and disrupts everything trapped inside its maw.

Choose a point that you can see within range. For the duration, you create a 10-foot-radius, 10-foot-high Cylinder centered on that point. Each creature in that Cylinder must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8 + 4} cold damage and can't cast spells on their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage but suffers no other effect. A creature also makes this save if it enters the Cylinder or ends its turn there, or if the Cylinder moves into its space. A creature makes this save only once per turn.
On your later turns, you can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to teleport the Cylinder up to 60 feet.
Maelstrom
Spell. Create a Maelstrom at target foe's location. For 10 seconds, foes adjacent to that area are struck for 10...22...25 cold damage each second. Maelstrom interrupts spell-casting when it hits.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8 + 1} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Leech Signet

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell or using an ability, and drain their energy on successfully interrupting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell/ability dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Leech Signet
Signet. Interrupt target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you gain 3...13...15 Energy.

spell.name: Determined Shot

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Ranged weapon

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Fire a shot, determined to hit, allowing you to immediately attack again if you miss.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d8} damage.
On a miss, you can immediately attack again, and the spell slot expended in the casting of this spell does not prevent you from casting other spells with spell slots during the same turn.
Determined Shot
Bow Attack. If Determined Shot hits, you strike for +5...17...20 damage. If Determined Shot fails to hit, all of your attack skills are recharged.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Rigor Mortis
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Curse a creature with rigor mortis, stiffening their body, making them unable to benefit from any temporary AC bonuses.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target cannot benefit from any temporary bonuses to AC.
Rigor Mortis
Hex Spell. For 8...18...20 seconds, target foe cannot block.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Lightning Touch
entries: {@variantrule Armor Penetration|GW}
Conjure up lightning around your hands and release a shockwave of electricity upon touching a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than you in a 5-foot radius centered on the target. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target takes {@damage 2d12} lightning damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition blinded} and has {@condition cracked armor|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
Lightning Touch

Skill. Target touched foe and all adjacent foes are struck for 10...50...60 lightning damage, are Blinded for 1...3...4 second[s], and have Cracked Armor for 1...8...10 second[s]. This skill has 25% armor penetration.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Life Bond
entries: {@variantrule Bond|GW}, {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Create a link between you and another willing creature, taking half the damage the creature would have taken instead.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the target has resistance to all damage. Also, each time the target takes damage, you lose health equal to the damage taken{@dice  - 2d4}.
Life Bond

Enchantment Spell. While you maintain this enchantment, whenever target other ally takes damage from an attack, half the damage is redirected to you. The damage you receive this way is reduced by 3...25...30.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the number subtracted increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Ward Against Melee
entries: Conjure a ward at your location, protecting your allies from melee attacks.

Conjure a 20-foot radius stationary ward at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. When a target is in the radius of the spell, a target has a +5 bonus to AC against melee weapon attacks.
Ward Against Melee
Ward Spell. You create a Ward Against Melee at your current location. For 5...17...20 seconds, non-spirit allies in this area have a 50% chance to block melee attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the AC bonus increases by 1 for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Signet of Devotion
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your signet of devotion, healing a creature.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} + your spellcasting ability modifier.
Signet of Devotion
Signet. Heal target ally for 14...83...100 Health.

spell.name: Throw Dirt
entries: Throw dirt into a group of creatures, blinding them.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Target each creature other than you in a 10-foot-radius centered on the target. Make a melee spell attack against each target. On a hit, a target is {@condition blinded} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Throw Dirt
Skill. Target touched foe and foes adjacent to your target become Blinded for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Aegis
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Conjure up a protective aegis around all party members, increasing their AC.
Choose any number of friendly creatures within range. For the duration, a target has a +5 bonus to AC.
Aegis
Enchantment Spell. For 5...10...11 seconds, all party members within earshot have a 50% chance to block attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Arcane Mimicry
entries: Weave your magic into an exact duplicate of an Elite spell of a friendly creature.
Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, replace this spell with the elite spell of the target.
Arcane Mimicry
Spell. For 20 seconds, Arcane Mimicry becomes the non-form elite skill from target other ally.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.

spell.name: Antidote Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Initiative
Activate your antidote signet, cleansing yourself of some conditions.
End {@condition Corruption|GW}, {@condition Disease|GW}, {@condition blinded|phb|Blindness}, {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} and the latest of harmful condition on yourself.
Antidote Signet
Signet. Cleanse yourself of Poison, Disease, and Blindness, and one additional condition.

spell.name: Healing Seed
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Plant a healing seed on a friendly creature, which bursts with healing energy every time the creature takes damage.

Choose one friendly creature, other than yourself, that you can see within range. For the duration when the target takes damage from a non-friendly source, target each friendly creature in a 10-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each new target regains hit points equal to {@dice 1d4}.
If the target drops to 0 hit points, this spell ends.
Healing Seed
Enchantment Spell. For 10 seconds, whenever target other ally takes damage, that ally and all adjacent allies gain 3...25...30 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Barbed Signet
entries: {@variantrule Sacrifice|GW|Sacrifice:} 8%, {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your barbed signet, making necrotic vines sprout in an area, lacerating creatures.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins {@condition bleeding|GW} for the duration, taking {@damage 3d6} damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, a target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Barbed Signet
Signet. You inflict Bleeding for 3...13...15 seconds on target foe and all adjacent foes.

spell.name: Barbed Trap
entries: Prepare a barbed trap, which damages, cripples, and bleeds creatures that trigger it.

Conjure a 15-foot radius stationary {@condition invisible} trap at your location for the duration and choose any number of creatures. The next time a non-chosen creature enters the spell's area, the trap triggers, applying the following effect for 1 round:

Each non-chosen creature must make a Dexterity saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 8d4} piercing damage, starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for one minute, taking {@damage 3d6} damage, and is {@condition crippled|GW} for one minute. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is affected by the conditions for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw for each condition affecting it. On a success, that condition ends.
This trap is nearly {@condition invisible}, requiring a successful Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check against your spell save DC to be discerned.
Barbed Trap

Trap. When Barbed Trap is triggered, all nearby foes are struck for 7...20...23 piercing damage, become Crippled, and begin Bleeding for 3...21...25 seconds. Barbed Trap ends after 90 seconds. While activating this skill, you are easily interrupted.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 2d4} for each slot level above 3rd, and the damage of the {@condition bleeding|GW} condition increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Axe Rake

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Go for the legs of a creature with a {@condition deep wound|GW}, dealing increased damage and crippling them.

On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if the target has a {@condition deep wound|GW}, the target becomes {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration and takes an additional {@damage 2d6} damage.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Axe Rake
Axe Attack. If this attack hits a foe suffering from a Deep Wound, you strike for +1...8...10 damage, and that foe becomes Crippled for 15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Dark Bond
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Form a dark bond between yourself and your undead minions, diverting damage from yourself to them.

For the duration, when you would take damage, the closest friendly undead creature, which has been created by a spell or an ability, within 30-feet of you, takes 75% of the damage you would have taken.
Dark Bond
Enchantment Spell. For the next 30...54...60 seconds, whenever you receive damage, your closest minion suffers 75% of that damage for you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 15-feet for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Hex Breaker
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Assume the {@variantrule stance|GW} of the hex breaker, preventing the next hex on yourself and retaliating against the caster.
For the duration, the next time you are the target of a harmful spell that requires {@status concentration}, you are immune to the spell's effects, and the caster takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
Hex Breaker
Stance. For 5...65...80 seconds, the next time you are the target of a hex, that hex fails and the caster takes 10...39...46 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Protective Spirit
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Summon a protective spirit around a creature, reducing the next big hit they take.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration, the next time the target would take damage, if that damage would be more than 10% of the target's maximum hit points, reduce the damage to 10% of the target's maximum hit points, then this spell ends.
Protective Spirit
Enchantment Spell. For 5...19...23 seconds, target ally cannot lose more than 10% max Health due to damage from a single attack or spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the duration increases by 1 round for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Maiming Strike
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Command your companion to maim a creature.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 2d10} damage, and, if the target willingly moved on its last turn, the target must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition crippled|GW} for the duration. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Maiming Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Maiming Strike that deals +5...17...20 damage. If that attack hits a moving foe that foe becomes Crippled for 3...13...15 seconds.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Power Drain

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell, and drain their energy on successfully interrupting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range. The creature makes a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, Bonus Action, or Reaction used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.
If you successfully interrupt a spell this way, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Power Drain
Spell. If target foe is casting a spell or chant, that skill is interrupted and you gain 1...25...31 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the increase in initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Purge Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Purge Signet, removing all negative effects from a creature at the cost of your initiative.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. End all harmful conditions on the target. Also, all harmful spells on the target end.
Your initiative roll gets reduced by Nd6, where N is the number of conditions and harmful spells ended this way.
Purge Signet
Signet. Remove all hexes and conditions from target ally. You lose 10 Energy for each hex and each condition removed.

spell.name: Rend Enchantments
entries: Forcefully rend beneficial spell from a creature, taking damage for each holy themed spell.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the latest {@dice 1d4+1} beneficial spells on the target end. On a successful save, half as many spells are ended.
If a holy themed beneficial spell was ended this way, you lose health equal {@dice 1d6} per holy themed spell ended this way.
Rend Enchantments
Spell. Remove 5...8...9 enchantments from target foe. For each Monk enchantment removed, you lose 55...31...25 Health.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, {@dice 1d4} additional spells are ended for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Signet of Humility
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Short Rest
Activate your Signet of Humility, humbling your target into not using their Elite skill.
Choose one hostile creature that you can see within range. The target cannot use Elite spells for the duration.
Signet of Humility
Signet. Target foe's elite skill is disabled for 1...13...16 second[s]. Your non-Mesmer skills are disabled for 10 seconds.

spell.name: Rebirth
entries: Resurrect and teleport a creature from a large range, with a large magical backlash.

Choose one friendly creature, which has not been dead for more than 1 minute, that you can see within range. The target returns to life with 25% of their maximum hit points and gets teleported within 5 feet of you. On the target's next turn, the target can use either an action or a bonus action, not both. Your initiative gets reduced by 30.
This spell can't return to life a creature that has died of old age, nor can it restore any missing body parts.
Rebirth

Spell. Resurrect target party member. Target party member is returned to life with 25% Health and zero Energy, and is teleported to your current location. All of target's skills are disabled for 10...4...3 seconds. This spell consumes all of your remaining Energy.

m.text: gems worth 300 gp, which the spell consumes

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the range of the spell increases by 30 feet for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Savage Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell; if you interrupt a spell this way, the target takes additional damage.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If a spell failed this way, the target takes an additional {@damage 3d8} damage.
Savage Shot
Bow Attack. If Savage Shot hits, your target's action is interrupted. If that action was a spell, you strike for +13...25...28 damage.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Heavy Blow

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Adrenaline|GW|Adrenaline:} 5, {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
Put all your adrenaline into a powerful blow, which knocks down weakened foes.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, and if the target is weakened, the target is knocked {@condition prone} and takes an additional {@damage 2d12} damage.
You lose all adrenaline.
Heavy Blow
Hammer Attack. Lose all adrenaline. If this attack hits a foe suffering from Weakness, that foe is knocked down and you strike for +1...24...30 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d12} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Spirit Shackles
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Throw a spectral pair of shackles around a creature's hand, reducing their initiative every time they attack.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit for the duration, when the target makes a weapon attack, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d6}.
Spirit Shackles
Hex Spell. For 5...17...20 seconds, target foe loses 5 Energy whenever that foe attacks.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the reduction of initiative increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and you can target one additional creature for every two slot levels above 1st.

spell.name: Smite Hex
entries: Smite a harmful spell on a friendly creature to deal damage to everyone around it.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. The latest harmful spell on the target ends. If a harmful spell was ended this way, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. A target takes {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
Smite Hex
Spell. Remove a hex from target ally. If a hex is removed, foes in the area suffer 10...70...85 holy damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Unholy Feast
entries: Suck out the life force from creatures around you, feasting on their energy.

Target each creature other than you within a 20-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage, and you regain hit points equal to the amount of necrotic damage dealt. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Unholy Feast
Spell. Steal up to 10...54...65 Health from up to 1...3...4 foes [sic] in the area.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Scavenger Strike
entries: {@variantrule Companion|GW}
Command your companion to attempt a Scavenger Strike.

Choose one companion that can hear you within range. The companion uses its reaction to make an attack against a creature of your choice that the companion can see within the companion's range. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects and takes {@damage 1d10} damage, and if the target is suffering from a condition, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Scavenger Strike
Pet Attack. Your animal companion attempts a Scavenger Strike that deals +10...22...25 damage. If the attack strikes a foe who is suffering a condition, you gain 3...13...15 Energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Stone Daggers
entries: Conjure two stone daggers and hurl them at a creature, inflicting {@condition bleeding|GW} if you are {@condition overcast|GW}.
Choose one creature that you can see within range. Make two ranged spell attacks against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d10} force damage.

{@variantrule Overcast|GW|Overcast:} Additionally, the target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target starts {@condition bleeding|GW} for 1 round, taking {@damage 1d6} damage.
Stone Daggers
Spell. Send out two Stone Daggers. Each Stone Dagger strikes target foe for 8...28...33 earth damage if it hits. If you are Overcast, each projectile inflicts Bleeding for 1...4...5 second[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the number of attacks increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Storm Chaser
entries: {@variantrule Stance|GW}
Channel elemental energy throughout your body, imbuing it with unnatural speed.
For the duration, your speed is increased by 25% and when you take acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder damage, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 1d4}.
Storm Chaser
Stance. For 8...18...20 seconds, you move 25% faster, and you gain 1...4...5 Energy whenever you take elemental damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Thrill of Victory

time.condition: which you take immediately before hitting a target with a Melee weapon or an Unarmed Strike

entries: {@variantrule Weapon Attack Spell|GW}
You gloat over a creature, gaining adrenaline if you have more health than them.
On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects, takes {@damage 2d8} damage, and if you have more hit points than the target, you gain {@dice 1d4} strikes of adrenaline.
Thrill of Victory
Melee Attack. If this blow hits, you deal +20...36...40 damage. If you have more Health than target foe, you gain 1...2...2 strike[s] of adrenaline.

m.text: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 1st on a hit.

spell.name: Balthazar's Aura
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Sheath an ally in a radiant aura of Balthazar, which burns all those close to them every turn.

Choose one friendly creature that you can see within range. For the duration at the start of each of the target's turns, target each hostile creature other than the target in a 10-foot Emanation centered on the target. Each new target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Balthazar's Aura
Enchantment Spell. For 8 seconds, foes adjacent to target ally take 10...22...25 holy damage each second.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Animate Bone Minions
entries: Exploit a nearby corpse to create two low-level {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors}.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, and the target becomes two {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors}. When using the level that appears in the stat block, subtract 2.
The {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} remain for the duration or until they reach zero hit points, at which point they will disintegrate into ash.

{@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} are friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} becomes hostile towards everything instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} act on your initiative but take their turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} are in the DM's control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another two {@creature Bone Horror|GW|Bone Horrors} this way.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th or 5th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Minions
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate two level 0...10...12 bone minions.

spell.name: Choking Gas
entries: {@variantrule Preparation|GW}
Attach some concentrated corpse flower essence to your arrows, disrupting all spellcasting around the impact area.

For the duration, your ranged weapon attacks deal an additional {@damage 1d8} poison damage, and when you hit a target with a ranged weapon attack, target each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on the target. Each target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target is {@condition incapacitated} until the end of their next turn.
Choking Gas
Preparation. For 1...10...12 seconds, your arrows deal 1...7...8 more damage and spread Choking Gas to all adjacent foes on impact. Choking Gas interrupts foes attempting to cast spells.

components.m: a petal of a corpse flower

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Deep Freeze
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Rapidly freeze an area, slowing down all creatures inside it.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 6d8} cold damage, and for the duration the target's speed is reduced by 66%. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is affected for 1 round only.
Deep Freeze
Hex Spell. You cause a Deep Freeze at target foe's location. All foes in this area are struck for 10...70...85 cold damage, and for 10 seconds, they move 66% slower.

components.m: a bunch of ice cubes and a metal box

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: Blessed Signet
entries: {@variantrule Signet|GW|Signet:} Long Rest
Activate your blessed signet, drawing divine power, refueling spell slots expended in the casting of bonds.
If you are maintaining one or more bonds, regain the spell slots expended in the casting of those bonds.
Blessed Signet
Signet. For each enchantment you are maintaining, you gain 3 Energy. You cannot gain more than 3...20...24 Energy in this way.

spell.name: Demonic Flesh
entries: {@variantrule Enchantment|GW}
Turn your own flesh demonic, letting it lash out at creatures around you when you cast a spell.

When you cast a spell of 1st level or higher that targets a hostile creature, target each creature other than you that you can see within a 10-foot Emanation. Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.
Demonic Flesh
Enchantment Spell. For 30...54...60 seconds, whenever you use a skill that targets a foe, you deal 5...17...20 shadow damage to all other foes adjacent to you.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Concussion Shot

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell

entries: You quickly fire an arrow in response to a creature casting a spell, interrupting the spell on a hit and {@condition dazed|GW|dazing} it.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a ranged weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 2d8} damage, the spell fails and has no effect, and the target is {@condition dazed|GW} for the duration.
At the end of each of its turns, the target can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Concussion Shot
Bow Attack. If Concussion Shot hits while target foe is casting a spell, the spell is interrupted and your target is Dazed for 5...17...20 seconds. This attack deals only 1...13...16 damage.

components.m: a ranged weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d8} damage for each slot level above 4th on a hit.

spell.name: Mind Wrack
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Fray a creature's mind, sending psychic shockwaves through them every time you target them with one of your other spells.

Choose one creature that you can see within range with an initiative higher than 0. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, if the target is the target of a Mesmer-themed spell, which does not require {@status concentration}, the target's initiative gets reduced by {@dice 1d4}. If this spell reduces the target's initiative, the target takes {@damage 1d6} psychic damage per initiative lost. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.
If the target's initiative is ever 0 or lower, this spell ends, and the target takes {@damage 4d6} psychic damage.
Mind Wrack

Hex Spell. For 5...33...40 seconds, whenever this foe is the target of any of your non-hex Mesmer skills, that foe loses 1 Energy and takes 5...21...25 damage per point of Energy lost. If the target foe's Energy drops to 0, Mind Wrack ends and that foe takes 15...83...100 damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage for each initiative lost increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st, and the damage when the spell ends increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.

spell.name: Scourge Healing
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Draw on your divine power to punish all those who heal a creature.

Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, for the duration, when the target regains hit points, target the healer. The new target takes {@damage 3d8} radiant damage. On a successful save, the target is affected for 1 round only.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 2nd.
Scourge Healing
Hex Spell. For 30 seconds, every time target foe is healed, the healer takes 15...67...80 holy damage.

spell.name: Savage Slash

time.condition: which you take when you see a creature within range cast a spell or using an ability

entries: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of using an ability or casting a spell.

Choose one creature, which is casting a spell or using an ability, that you can see within range of your weapon. Make a melee weapon attack against the target. On a hit, the target suffers the weapon attack's normal effects and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ability/spell fails and has no effect.
If a spell failed this way, the target takes an additional {@damage 4d6} damage.
Savage Slash
Sword Attack. If this attack hits, it interrupts target foe's action. If that action was a spell, you deal 1...32...40 extra damage.

components.m: a melee weapon worth at least 1 sp

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the target also takes {@damage 1d6} damage for each slot level above 3rd on a hit.

spell.name: Animate Bone Fiend
entries: Exploit a nearby corpse to create a {@creature Bone Fiend|GW}.

Choose one dead creature, which has not been dead for more than 5 minutes and which has not been exploited by a spell, that you can see within range. Exploit that target, and the target becomes a {@creature Bone Fiend|GW}.
The {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} remains for the duration or until it reaches zero hit points, at which point it will disintegrate into ash.

The {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} is friendly to you and your allies for the duration. If you fall {@condition unconscious}, the {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} becomes hostile towards everything instead of disintegrating into ash. The {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} acts on your initiative but takes its turn directly after yours. The {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} is in the DM's control.
On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to animate another {@creature Bone Fiend|GW} this way.

components.m: the tail bone of a devourer

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, use the higher level wherever the spell's level appears in the stat block. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th or 6th level, the duration increases to 8 hours. When you use a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the duration increases to 24 hours.
Animate Bone Fiend
Spell. Exploit nearest corpse to animate a level 1...14...17 bone fiend. Bone fiends can attack at range.

spell.name: Charm Animal
entries: Channel your magic into tracking down and charming a wild animal, turning it into a companion.

As part of the casting of this spell, you can spend {@dice 1d4} hours magically searching for an appropriate creature to charm. If you do so, roll on the {@table Charm Animal Beast List|GW} table by making either a Wisdom (Animal Handling), a Wisdom (Survival), or an Intelligence (Nature) check to determine which beast will appear (your DM might decide to replace animals from the list).

When you find an appropriate creature to charm, either by searching for it or having already encountered one (in which case it needs to be a beast of challenge rating 1 or lower, with an Intelligence score of 3 or less), you can attempt to charm it by touching it.

When you successfully touch it, it must make a Wisdom saving throw if you or your allies are fighting it. On a failed save, or if you or your allies are not fighting it, the target is {@condition charmed} by you for the next 24 hours. While the creature is {@condition charmed} in this way, you can expend a spell slot of equal or higher level than the one used in the casting of this spell to reset the duration of the {@condition charmed} condition on the beast to 24 hours by spending 1 minute caring for it while it is within 5 feet of you. To do this, you must have the {@spell Charm Animal|GW} spell prepared or any other spell that states that it can be used instead.

The creature is an ally to you and your allies and is considered a {@variantrule Companion|GW}. It rolls its initiative and acts on its turn. While the creature is {@condition charmed}, you have a telepathic link with it as long as the two of you are on the same plane of existence and are within 100 miles of each other. You can use this telepathic link to issue commands to the creature while you are conscious (no action required), which it does its best to obey. You can specify a simple and general course of action, such as “Attack that creature,” “Run over there,” or “Fetch that object.” If the creature completes the order and doesn't receive further direction from you, it defends and preserves itself to the best of its ability.
After charming a creature with this spell, you cannot cast this spell again until {@dice 1d6} days have passed.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the duration to find an appropriate animal increases by {@dice 1d4} hours for each slot level above 1st, you gain a {@dice 1d4} bonus to the ability check for each slot level above 1st, the maximum challenge rating and intelligence score for beasts not found via a table increases by 1 for each slot level above 1st, and the time until you can cast the spell again increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
Charm Animal
Skill. Charm target animal. Once charmed, your animal companion will travel with you whenever you have Charm Animal equipped. You cannot charm an animal that is more than 4 levels above you.

spell.name: Arcane Conundrum
entries: {@variantrule Hex|GW}
Befuddle a group of creatures with an arcane conundrum, increasing the casting time of their spells.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save for the duration, a target can't cast spells as reactions, must cast spells that take a bonus action as an action, and any other spell takes twice as long to cast. On a successful save, a target is affected for 1 round only.
When this spell ends on a target, your initiative gets increased by {@dice 2d4}.
Arcane Conundrum
Hex Spell. For 5...13...15 seconds, spells cast by target foe and all adjacent foes take twice as long to cast. When this hex ends, you gain 1...6...7 energy.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the increase of initiative increases by {@dice 1d4} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Healing Touch
entries: You magically imbue a creature with vitality by touching them.
You touch a creature. The target regains hit points equal to {@dice 4d8} + twice your spellcasting ability modifier.
Healing Touch
Spell. Heal target touched ally for 16...51...60 Health. Health gain from Divine Favor is doubled for this spell.

entriesHigherLevel.name: Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 2d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Chilblains
entries: Corrupt your blood to curse an area to wither away their enchantments.

Choose a point that you can see within range. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage 4d8} necrotic damage and the latest beneficial spell on a target ends. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.
You are  {@condition Corruption|GW|corrupted} for the duration, taking {@damage 1d8} damage.
At the end of each of your turns, you can make a Constitution saving throw. On a success, the condition ends.
Chilblains
Spell. You become Poisoned for 10 seconds. Foes in the area of your target are struck for 10...37...44 cold damage and lose 1...2...2 enchantment[s].

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd and one additional spell ends for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Obsidian Flame
